channel.title: Quick Question.[PI]
channel.description: I'm curious, is it possible to make an area that is a heightLevel of 2 an area? Like for example, if I wanted to make some place a PK spot. But it's only a pk spot in that range of positions and the player(s) heightlevel is 2. But if they are in the range of positions, and there heightlevel is anything else but 2 it is not a pk area. Is it possible? If you need it explained better tell me and i'll try to explain it further/better.

item.title: Quick Question.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Alright, but since to make area PvP it’s done with

public boolean isInPvP() { if(absX >= 3162 && absX <= 3287 && absY >= 3355 && absY <= 3511) { return true; } return false; }
How would you use c.heightLevelhere?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I’m curious, is it possible to make an area that is a heightLevel of 2 an area?
Like for example, if I wanted to make some place a PK spot. But it’s only a pk spot in that range of positions and the player(s) heightlevel is 2. But if they are in the range of positions, and there heightlevel is anything else but 2 it is not a pk area.
Is it possible? If you need it explained better tell me and i’ll try to explain it further/better.
